|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7161;AR7161-BC1A, PB5653.002C, 0835, CHINA; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 680<!-- 680 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12805DMI-20G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Mira;P3S12D40ETP-G5; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Infineon;ADM6996FC; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:15:6D
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;0.9.8.04;UBNT; |stockos = Linux;;OpenWrt;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI,USB 2.0 |exp_minipci_num = 3 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = 12-24 |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = Ethernet (PoE)

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = GPIO |addchip = High Efficiency, Synchronous Buck with Dual Linear Controllers;Richtek;RT9206;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;AlphaΩAO4468;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel Enahanced Mode FET;AlphaΩAOD484;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;AlphaΩAON7700;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = U-MEDIA |manuf_model = MPB-880 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, DD-WRT
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2008 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device runs [[OpenWrt]] on the stock firmware.
The power supply voltage range is 12VDC to 24VDC.
"081R-MPB880AN00 R06" is printed on a sticker attached to the bottom of the unit. :This would seem to indicate the device was manufactured by '''U-MEDIA'''. :"Designed in U.S.A." is silkscreened on the top of the board.
Note: The PCI controller on 7161 [https://dev.openwrt.org/ticket/7759 cannot handle I/O resources]. :This isn't a problem for [[Atheros]] based Wi-Fi cards, but it is generally a problem for others..
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.ubnt.com/wiki/RouterStation ''RouterStation'' on the '''Ubiquiti Wiki''']
